# Welcome,

The Data Science Initiative at Chico State is a resource of information and support for our campus and community.

By providing data science education, research, and collaboration across disciplines we equip students with the skills needed to analyze and interpret complex data, while also providing faculty and community members with data-driven solutions through partnerships and consulting services.
